column5: I am doing a fishing trip up north with my brother    and he needs to check 100 or so emails a day. Can we rent a satellite phone for the week we need it? Can Satellite phones be used to check email? If so where could i get a Satellite phone near Barrie?  The only other way i can think of is if we use On star in my car.  But we would have to take two cars then.  Thanks for any help.
It ain`t cheap but you can rent them. The only expensive part is using it...lol
Radioworld rents out satellite phones & other electronics but should call in advance to reserve for the week you will need it......
Thanks GB. We need it for a week and about 5-8hrs total.  Would that be more then $400?  Would i be able to rent one in Barrie?
Thanks otter i will call them.
Going rate is $100-$125/week plus airtime.  Make sure you gat an Iridium Sat Phone and not a Global Star. The global Star system is terrible with narrow signal windows.
Depending on which way you are heading Glen.. Temagami Outfitters rents them or at least they did.
